str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of the compound of a derivative of the base of tolmao; more daringly, i.e. With greater confidence than otherwise.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To remind, possibly: I remind again. From epi and anamimnesko; to remind of.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
